Paragraph: 28 The optical band gaps of P1-P7 were estimated to be 1.38 , 1.38 , 1.40 , 1.42 , 1.49 , 1.55 , and 1.85 eV , respectively , based on the onset of the light absorption.

| onset of light absorption for P7 |

These entities are identified based on the context of the paragraph. The "Property Name" for each entity is the noun phrase that describes the property being measured or estimated. In this case, the property being measured is the optical band gap and the onset of light absorption for each of the compounds P1 through P7.
